                        Document previousDocument,

Description copied from class: ProxyFilter
Performs the processing on the currentDocument. originalDocument and previousDocument are provided for reference and should not be modified.

Specified by:
process in class ProxyFilter
Parameters:
originalDocument - The original document
previousDocument - The output of the filter run previously, or null if there wasn't one
currentDocument - the document to be modified
Returns:
the result of the modification (usually just currentDocument)

resizeString

private String resizeString(String s,
                            double scaleFactor)
Multiplies the first contiguous chunk of numbers by the scale factor. Then it rounds the number to the nearest unit and reinserts the number.

Parameters:
s - the string containing the number to resize
scaleFactor - the scaling factor (2 for instance doubles the number)
Returns:
the string with the rescaled number

                                 String s,
                                 double scaleFactor)
